user.title: Create a Lightener device
user.description: Please provide a name for the Lightener device you are creating

data_description.name: The purpose is to clearly indicate which group of lights is controlled by this device. Typically, it is an area or room name, such as "Living Room," but it can be anything

data.controlled_entities: Select the light entities to be controlled by this Lightener device

data_description.brightness: A list that maps the brightness of this light when the Lightener reaches certain brightness levels. Each line has the format (Lightener brightness %): (Controlled light brightness %). For example, "60:100" specifies that when the Lightener reaches 60% brightness, "{light_name}" will reach 100% brightness

error.invalid_brightness: Invalid brightness mapping configuration "{error_entry}". Each line must have the format "(number from 1 to 100): (number from 0 to 100)". For example, "40:100"
